description:
Once the greatest hitman of all, he retired after falling in love with his wife, Aoi. He now runs "Sakamoto`s Store" in a quiet town. Though his physique has rounded out since his marriage, he still has all the prowess from his hitman days. He carries no weapons, instead preferring to fight with whatever`s handy. He loves his wife and daughter above all else.
Source: Official page
name: Sakamoto Tarou
